monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Activates earth orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Armor Up
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 75% Defense) Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Dual Wield
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Goblin Defense
skills.description: Aura: All Goblins in the party receive 10% less damage and gain a random Buff at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Healing Link
skills.description: Whenever another Monster in your party is healed, this Monster has a 25% chance to get healed by the same amount.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Improved Barrier
skills.description: Unique Aura: Barrier (Buff) reduces damage received by an additional 7.5%.

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Mega Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield all for 3 x (250 + 30% Defense)

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Poison Glands
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Poison on the attacker.

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Reflect
skills.description: When getting attacked, reflect 40% (20% in Keeper Battles) of the damage back to the attacker. (Reflected damage isn't affected by any modifiers)

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Stick Focus
skills.description: When this Monster has a Wooden Stick equipped, it gains 300 Attack, 60 Defense, and it Shields all allies for 600 at start of combat.

skills.name: Sustain
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Toxic Slam
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Ultra Speed
skills.description: Applies Agility, Spellshield & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.
